author: Zack Budryk
title: Idaho governor issues stay at home order for 21 days amid coronavirus spread
description: Idaho Gov. Brad Little (R) said Wednesday that he will order residents to remain in their homes most of the time to stem the spread of the novel coronavirus for the next 21 days."Idaho is now in a new stage," Littl...
content:
Idaho Gov. Brad Little (R) said Wednesday that he will order residents to remain in their homes most of the time to stem the spread of the novel coronavirus for the next 21 days.
Idaho is now in a new stage, Little said Wednesday, according to the Idaho Stat… [+2060 chars]
